item.title: [525] dragon claws [525]
item.dc:creator: @boomer4456 boomer4456
item.description:
@boomer4456 wrote:

hi i have a 525 server with the actual real dragon claws and real spec but thers a problem its way to piowerful! its like a 2 hit k0 unless you know how to safe good can anyone tell me how to lower the spec hits heres code of it that i found in playercombat.java

} if (p.getEquipment().get(3).getDefinition().getId() == 14484 && p.specialAmount >= 50) { p.faceId(p2); p.graphics(1950, 0); p.animate(10961, 0); p2.hit(meleeDamage); meleeDamage = Misc.random(p.MaxHitMelee()); p2.hit(meleeDamage); meleeDamage = Misc.random(p.MaxHitMelee()); p2.hit(meleeDamage); meleeDamage = Misc.random(p.MaxHitMelee()); p2.hit(meleeDamage); p2.combatWith = p.getIndex(); p.combatDelay = getCombatDelay(p); p2.cmbResetTimer = 8; p.specialAmount -= p.getSpecialAmount(); p.usingSpecial = false; [br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 17, 2009, 11:39:17 am[/size][hr]bump?
